original_text: For they have taken some of their daughters to be wives for themselves and for their sons, so that the holy race has mixed itself with the peoples of the lands. And in this faithlessness the hand of the officials and chief men has been foremost.”
korean_text: 그들의 딸을 맞이하여 아내와 며느리로 삼아 거룩한 자손이 그 지방 사람들과 서로 섞이게 하는데 방백들과 고관들이 이 죄에 더욱 으뜸이 되었다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: For they have taken some of their daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 딸들 중 일부를 데려왔으니

sentences.original_text: to be wives for themselves and for their sons
so that the holy race has mixed itself
with the peoples of the lands
the hand of the officials and chief men
